newsitem.title: KAZAKHSTAN: Three die after torrential rains in Kyrgyzstan.
newsitem.headline: Three die after torrential rains in Kyrgyzstan.

text.p: Three people died in the south of the former Soviet republic of Kyrgyzstan after houses were washed away by days of torrential rain, Itar-Tass news agency said on Thursday.
Tass, quoting the Central Asian country's Ministry for Emergency Situations, said the rains -- pouring since April 30 -- had destroyed 140 homes and inundated 450 hectares (1,100 acres) of cropland.
It put damage at an estimated $1.5 million and said musdslides expected after the rains could make the situation in the region even more difficult.
